Module io.github.jonloucks.contracts.api
Package io.github.jonloucks.contracts.api

Class GlobalContracts

java.lang.Object
io.github.jonloucks.contracts.api.GlobalContracts
public final class GlobalContracts extends Object
Provides access to the shared singleton of a Contracts implementation

  • Method Details

    • claimContract

      public static <T> T claimContract(Contract<T> contract)
      Claim the deliverable from a bound contract.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of value returned
      Parameters:
      contract - the contract to claim
      Returns:
      the value returned by the bound Promisor. A Promisor can return null
      Throws:
      ContractException - if Promisor binding does not exist for the contract
      SecurityException - if permission is denied
      See Also:
      • Contracts.claim(Contract)

    • bindContract

      public static <T> AutoClose bindContract(Contract<T> contract, Promisor<T> promisor)
      Establish a binding between a Contract and a Promisor
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the value returned by the promisor
      Parameters:
      contract - the contract to bind the Promisor
      promisor - the Promisor for the given contract
      Returns:
      Use to release (unbind) this contract
      Throws:
      ContractException - when contract is already bound and can't be replaced
      SecurityException - when permission to bind is denied

    • isContractBound

      public static <T> boolean isContractBound(Contract<T> contract)
      Checks if the contract is bound to a Promisor
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the value returned by the promisor
      Parameters:
      contract - the contract to check
      Returns:
      true iif bound

    • singleton

      public static <T> Promisor<T> singleton(Promisor<T> promisor)
      Creates a Promisor that only calls the source Promisor once and then always returns that value. Note: increment and decrementUsage are relayed to the source promisor.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of deliverable
      Parameters:
      promisor - the source Promisor
      Returns:
      The new Promisor

    • lifeCycle

      public static <T> Promisor<T> lifeCycle(Promisor<T> promisor)
      Reference counted, lazy loaded, with opt-in 'open' and 'close' invoked on deliverable. Note: increment and decrementUsage are relayed to the source promisor.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of deliverable
      Parameters:
      promisor - the source promisor
      Returns:
      the new Promisor

    • getInstance

      public static Contracts getInstance()
      Return the global instance of Contracts
      Returns:
      the instance

    • createContracts

      public static Contracts createContracts(Contracts.Config config)
      Create a standalone Contracts service. Note: Contracts created from this method are destink any that used internally

      Caller is responsible for invoking open() before use and close when no longer needed

      Parameters:
      config - the service configuration
      Returns:
      the new service
